TM.TITLE: TRANSLATION MANAGEMENT (change) (version 1)
TM.CONTENT: Translate a few software strings or deploy Memsource to automate translations in your global organization. Whether you use in-house linguists, translation companies, or machine translation, Memsource provides all you need to automate the process end-to-end, including out-of-the box CMS connectors, powerful continuous localization features, and rich REST API.
